steps.section: Plung freezing of 20S CPs amd 20S CP assembly intermediates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b75rd","text":"Prepare Vitrobot and grids for plunging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7f19","text":"Set up Vitrobot as follows: blot force = 3, blot time =   sec, humidity 100%, temperature  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mh9h","text":"Plasma clean Quantifoil R1.2/1.3 Cu 200 grids for   sec , just before plunging","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3tbs3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcror","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":45,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Plung freezing of 20S CPs amd 20S CP assembly intermediates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"13fiu","text":"Apply   of purified 20S CPs at a concentration of   or purified and concentrated 20S CP assembly intermediates at a concentration of   with Fos8-cholin at a finale concentration of   on grids, automatically blot and plunge in ethane/propane mix at    with a Vitrobot Mark IV  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":181,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":248,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cbsht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5-0.6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4.0-5.0","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-180","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1sluh","text":"Screen cryoEM grids for particle density and ice quality on a Glacios cryo-TEM (Thermo Fisher","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq6mi","text":"Scientific) or cryo-TEM of your choise","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36orh","text":"Data collection was carried out either on a  Glacios cryo-TEM (Thermo Fisher Scientific) operated at 200 kV equipped with a K2 Summit direct electron detector (DED) camera (Gatan) or Titan Krios G2 cryo-TEM (Thermo Fisher Scientific) operated at 300 kV equipped with a Bio Quantum post-column energy filter (Gatan, 10eV) and K3 direct electron detector (DED) camera (Gatan)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3594q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16hrd","text":"Data collection on both on the Glacios and Titan Krios G2 cryo-TEM  and was set up with SerialEM version 4.1 utilizing coma-corrected beam-image shift","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flca7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23it9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7b5n","text":"Glacios datasets where recorded with one movie per hole  in counting mode with a 3x3 or 5x5 multi hole record acquisition scheme at a pixel size of 1.181 Å/pixel with a nominal magnification of 36000x, or at a pixel size of 1.885 Å/pixel with a nominal magnification of 22000x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee5b7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ivba","text":"A total dose of 60 e-/Å2 was fractionated over 40 frames, with a target defocus range of -1.0 μm to -2.6 μm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82ed5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dor58","text":"Krios datasets where recorded with three movie per hole  in counting mode with a 5x5 multi hole record acquisition scheme at a pixel size of 0.8512 Å/pixel with a nominal magnification of 105000x ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i926","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p2bs","text":"A total dose of 68 e-/Å2 was fractionated over 30 frames, with a target defocus range of -1.0 μm to -2.6 μm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de1am","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Mastronarde
